thread.title: Stacey Apgar on Charmoy Dental in Randolph, New Jersey
thread.title_full: Stacey Apgar on Charmoy Dental in Randolph, New Jersey | Examiner.com

author: Ann Day
title: Stacey Apgar on Charmoy Dental in Randolph, New Jersey
text:
Charmoy Dental of Randolph, NJ attempting to get 1,000 likes on Facebook by Halloween Alexa, an assistant at Chamroy Dental Charmoy Dental is located in Randolph, New Jersey . Charmoy Dental employs six assistants, six hygienists and three dentists and they have attended "various schools and degrees" according to Apgar.
The staff at the office are attempting to get 1,000 likes to their Facebook page by October 31, 2015. Stacey Apgar of Charmoy Dental Associates stated "Dr. Schultz made us a challenge. We were talking about getting 1,000 likes and he said that's impossible, you can't do that." The staff put up a photo asking for people on Facebook to help them prove Dr. Schultz wrong. As of October 5, 2015 Apgar said the Charmoy Dental Associates page had 574 "likes" on Facebook. As of 5:55 a.m. CST on October 7, 2015 the Facebook page for Charmoy Dental had 635 "likes" and still needed 365 more people to hit the like button to meet their goal by Halloween.
She also stated that the office will not be dressing up this year for Halloween because it will be closed on October 31st and that also happens to be the the same day the challenge ends about getting 1,000 Facebook "likes" for Charmoy Dental. They have decorated the office for Halloween and Apgar stated that they "love decorating for all seasons/holidays".
Apgar said the office has received some comments about trying to get 1,000 likes on their Facebook page. People have said "You can do this" and "Let's prove Dr. Mike wrong". Alexa, who is an assistant at the office, took the photo of their team leader Jenna Lowthert, who recently published a book called "Life goes on".
She was also asked about each employee's favorite restaurant. Apgar replied that the staff can also be seen at Cafe Fiori eating together. "We have gone go-cart racing, out for dinners, movie lunch trip as a group, deck parties at different employees homes." Apgar explained about what the staff did together. Apgar mentioned that Dr. Schultz was born and raised in New Jersey but is a Dallas Cowboys fan and that he "just loves them cowgirls! (oopsie I mean Cowboys LOL)" she wrote. Apgar added that Dr. Castro is a fan of the Green Bay Packers. The people who work at Charmoy Dental Associations have also participated in food drives, toy drives and "Dentistry from the Heart".
Charmoy Dental Associates can see emergency patients on the same day they call for an appointment and Apgar said they also had openings for cleaning appointments on the same day. Apgar wrote that "We do our best to save a.m. and p.m. appointments for emergencies and procrastinators, LOL!", Charmoy Dental has nitrous oxide available for patients and Apgar stated that the nitrous was free to patients and added "We believe in the patient's comfort and it is #1". When asked about specials on night guards and bleaching trays, Apgar answered "We do specials all the time. That is announced on Facebook."
Charmoy Dental Associates is located at 924 Rt. 10W, Randolph, New Jersey 07869 and the phone number is 973-584-0008. Their office is open Monday - Thursday 8 a.m. to 7 p.m., Friday/Saturday 8:30 a.m. - 1 p.m.
